jCarousel Riding carousels with jQuery Version: 0.3.1
  • Documentation
  • Examples
  • Contributing
  • GitHub
  • Download

Download

jCarousel and its plugins can be downloaded as a full ready-to-go file or as separate files. Additionally, you can download the complete source code including examples from the GitHub repository.

  • Full Download
  • Separate Downloads
  • Source Code

All files are also available from CDNJS.

Full Download

This file contains the core and all plugins concenated together.

  • Production Version (compressed)
  • Development Version (uncompressed)

Separate Downloads

jCarousel Core

  • Production Version (compressed)
  • Development Version (uncompressed)

jCarousel Plugins

Note: Plugins require that you also include the core file before.

  • Production Version (compressed)
  • Development Version (uncompressed)

  • Production Version (compressed)
  • Development Version (uncompressed)

  • Production Version (compressed)

  • Development Version (uncompressed)

The source code for all versions can be downloaded from the release page at GitHub.
